column2: The Peck Co. Holdings, Inc. is a blank check company. The company is headquartered in Freehold, New Jersey. The firm operates through three divisions: Peck Solar, Peck Electric and Peck Data. Peck Solar division designs and constructs solar photovoltaics (PV) and storage systems. Its solar photovoltaic installation services include initial site analysis, solar payback estimates, solar site planning and design, project management and general consulting, installation and post-installation monitoring and maintenance. Peck Electric provides electrical services with training and experience in various aspects of electrical wiring for residential, commercial, and industrial properties. Peck Electric also offers control wiring and logic controllers, high voltage power distribution, and lighting. Peck Data designs and provides data, communications, and infrastructure support. The company installs network and voice cabling for residential and commercial customers.
